00053 RainbruRPG::Gui::FoxServerList::
00054 FoxServerList(FXComposite *parent,FXuint opts)
00055   :FXPacker(parent, opts)
00056 {
00057   selServer="";
00058 
00059   FXVerticalFrame *root = new FXVerticalFrame(this,
00060              LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_FILL_Y);
00061 
00062   FXString lab="This screen provides the server management. From the list "
00063     "of servers below, you can chose one and edit it.";
00064   FXLabel* labAdminName=new FXLabel(root, lab);
00065 
00066  // frame containing admin info and button
00067   FXHorizontalFrame *hframe = new FXHorizontalFrame(root,
00068              LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_FILL_Y);
00069 
00070 
00071   FXVerticalFrame *frame = new FXVerticalFrame(hframe,
00072              LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_FILL_Y);
00073 
00074   FXint tableOpt=LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_FILL_Y|TABLE_COL_SIZABLE;
00075   tableOpt+=TABLE_NO_COLSELECT|TABLE_ROW_RENUMBER|TABLE_READONLY;
00076 
00077   table=new FXTable(frame, this, ID_TABLE, tableOpt);
00078 
00079   // Serverlist count label
00080   labPlCount=new FXLabel(frame, "Total servers : <not set>");
00081 
00082   // Buttons in the right
00083   FXVerticalFrame *btnFrame = new FXVerticalFrame(hframe);
00084   FXuint btnOpts= LAYOUT_FILL_X|BUTTON_NORMAL;
00085   FXButton* btn1=new FXButton( btnFrame, "Add", NULL, this, ID_ADD, btnOpts);
00086   btnDelete=new FXButton( btnFrame, "Delete", NULL, this, ID_DEL, btnOpts);
00087   btnDesc=new FXButton( btnFrame, "Description", NULL, this, ID_DESC, btnOpts);
00088   btnTech=new FXButton( btnFrame, "TechNote", NULL, this, ID_TECH, btnOpts);
00089   btnEdit=new FXButton( btnFrame, "Edit", NULL, this, ID_EDIT, btnOpts);
00090   btnDelete->disable();
00091   btnDesc->disable();
00092   btnTech->disable();
00093   btnEdit->disable();
00094 
00095   // Initialize the panel
00096   refresh();
00097 }

00142 void RainbruRPG::Gui::FoxServerList::feedTable(){
00143   LOGI("Starting feedTable");
00144   tServerList* pl=serverList->getServerList();
00145   if (pl){
00146     setServerNumber(pl->size());
00147 
00148     // Feeding ^^
00149     tServerList::const_iterator iter;
00150     for (iter=pl->begin(); iter != pl->end(); iter++){
00151       this->addServer((*iter));
00152     }
00153 
00154     pl=NULL;
00155     LOGI("feedTable complete");
00156   }
00157   else{
00158     LOGE("Cannot get a valid account list");
00159   }
00160 }
00161 
00170 void RainbruRPG::Gui::FoxServerList::setServerNumber(unsigned int i){
00171   std::ostringstream temp ;
00172   temp << "Total servers : ";
00173   temp << i;
00174 
00175   labPlCount->setText(temp.str().c_str());
00176 }

00183 void RainbruRPG::Gui::FoxServerList::
00184 addServer(RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::tServerListItem* p){
00185   FXString s;
00186 
00187   FXint num=table->getNumRows();
00188 
00189   // Adds a new row at the end of the table
00190   table->insertRows(num, 1);
00191 
00192   std::ostringstream temp ;
00193   temp << num+1;
00194 
00195   // Set the row header
00196   table->getRowHeader()->setItemText(num, temp.str().c_str());
00197   table->getRowHeader()->setItemJustify(num, FXHeaderItem::RIGHT);
00198 
00199   // Sets the name
00200   FXTableItem* item=new FXTableItem(p->name);
00201   table->setItem(num, 0, item);
00202 
00203   // Sets the mail
00204   FXTableItem* item2=new FXTableItem(p->ipAdress);
00205   table->setItem(num, 1, item2);
00206 
00207   // Sets the blacklist status
00208   FXTableItem* item3=new FXTableItem(p->port);
00209   table->setItem(num, 2, item3);
00210 
00211   // Sets the creation date
00212   FXTableItem* item4=new FXTableItem(p->creation.c_str());
00213   table->setItem(num, 3, item4);
00214 
00215   // Sets the clients informations
00216   std::string cli="";
00217   cli= StringConv::getSingleton().itos(p->actClients);
00218   cli+="/" ;
00219   cli+= StringConv::getSingleton().itos(p->maxClients);
00220 
00221   FXTableItem* item5=new FXTableItem(cli.c_str());
00222   table->setItem(num, 4, item5);
00223 
00224 
00225 }

00239 long RainbruRPG::Gui::FoxServerList::
00240 onShowAddServerDialog(FXObject * o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00241   LOGI("Add server button clicked");
00242 
00243   AddServer as(getApp());
00244   // Setting PLACEMENT_SCREEN as placement behavior in the next call
00245   // seems to get the dialog unreachable with the mouse (the prg freezes)
00246   FXuint res=as.execute();
00247 
00248   if (res==TRUE){
00249     refresh();
00250   }
00251 
00252   return 1;
00253 }
00254 
00263 void RainbruRPG::Gui::FoxServerList::refresh(){
00264   // Destructs the current serverList
00265   if (serverList)
00266     delete serverList;
00267 
00268   serverList=new xmlServerList();
00269 
00270   table->clearItems();
00271   createTableHeader();
00272   feedTable();
00273 }
00274 
00281 void RainbruRPG::Gui::FoxServerList::createTableHeader(){
00282   table->insertColumns(0, 5);
00283   table->getColumnHeader()->setItemText(0, "Name");
00284   table->getColumnHeader()->setItemText(1, "Ip");
00285   table->getColumnHeader()->setItemText(2, "Port");
00286   table->getColumnHeader()->setItemText(3, "Creation");
00287   table->getColumnHeader()->setItemText(4, "Clients");
00288   table->getRowHeader()->setWidth(40);
00289 }

00301 FXString RainbruRPG::Gui::FoxServerList::getSelectedServerName(){
00302   FXint selRow=table->getSelStartRow();
00303 
00304   FXString s=table->getItem(selRow, 0)->getText();
00305   return s;
00306 }
00307 
00323 long RainbruRPG::Gui::FoxServerList::
00324 onTableSelectionChange(FXObject *o,FXSelector sel,void* v){
00325   FXint selRow=table->getSelStartRow();
00326   table->selectRow(selRow);
00327 
00328   selServer=getSelectedServerName();
00329   std::string name(selServer.text());
00330   LOGCATS("Selected server name : '");
00331   LOGCATS(name.c_str());
00332   LOGCATS("'");
00333   LOGCAT();
00334 
00335   if (selServer.empty()){
00336     btnDelete->disable();
00337     btnEdit->disable();
00338   }
00339   else{
00340     btnDelete->enable();
00341     btnEdit->enable();
00342     btnDesc->enable();
00343     btnTech->enable();
00344   }
00345 }

00360 long RainbruRPG::Gui::FoxServerList::
00361 onShowDeleteServerDialog(FXObject * o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00362   DeleteServer ds(getApp(), selServer);
00363   FXuint res=ds.execute();
00364 
00365   if (res==TRUE){
00366     refresh();
00367   }
00368 }
